businessmodel.order

Class SingleTaskOrder

  • java.lang.Object
    • businessmodel.order.Order
      • businessmodel.order.SingleTaskOrder

  • public class SingleTaskOrder
extends Order
    Class representing a single task order. This class extends an abstract order.
    Author:
    SWOP team 10 2013-2014

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SingleTaskOrder(User user, java.util.ArrayList<VehicleOption> options, org.joda.time.DateTime userEndDate)
      Creates a new single task order with a given user, set of options and user end date.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SingleTaskOrder

        public SingleTaskOrder(User user,
               java.util.ArrayList<VehicleOption> options,
               org.joda.time.DateTime userEndDate)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                       NoClearanceException,
                       UnsatisfiedRestrictionException
        Creates a new single task order with a given user, set of options and user end date.
        Parameters:
        user - The user that placed the order.
        options - The options that are ordered.
        userEndDate - The date the user wants the order to be finished.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        NoClearanceException
        UnsatisfiedRestrictionException
